Function Documentation

int SPMIDI_AddWaveSet (  SPMIDI_Context *  spmidiContext,
WaveSet_t *  waveSet
) 
 

Add a WaveSet for internal storage and use.

The contents of the definition are specific to the synthesizer in use. Returns negative error or positive waveSet token.

int SPMIDI_AddWaveTable (  SPMIDI_Context *  spmidiContext,
WaveTable_t *  waveTable
) 
 

Add a WaveTable for internal storage and use.

The contents of the definition are specific to the synthesizer in use. Returns negative error or positive waveTable token.

unsigned char *  data,
int  numBytes
) 
 

Download a WaveSet for internal storage and use.

The contents of the definition are specific to the synthesizer in use. Returns negative error or positive waveSet token.

int SPMIDI_LoadWaveTable (  SPMIDI_Context *  spmidiContext,
unsigned char *  data,
int  numBytes
) 
 

Download a WaveTable for internal storage and use.

The contents of the definition are specific to the synthesizer in use. Returns negative error or positive waveTable token.

int SPMIDI_SetDrumMap (  SPMIDI_Context *  spmidiContext,
int  noteIndex,
int  insIndex,
int  pitch
) 
 

Map a MIDI drum pitch to an instrument index.

This allows multiple drums to be mapped to a single instrument.

Parameters:
noteIndex MIDI pitch of note on rhythm channel that triggers this drum
insIndex index used when defining instrument with SPMIDI_SetInstrumentDefinition()
pitch pitch of instrument when playing this drum sound

int SPMIDI_SetInstrumentDefinition (  SPMIDI_Context *  spmidiContext,
int  insIndex,
unsigned char *  data,
int  numBytes
) 
 

Download an instrument definition as a byte stream.

The contents of the definition are specific to the synthesizer in use.

Parameters:
insIndex index within internal presets array

int SPMIDI_SetInstrumentMap (  SPMIDI_Context *  spmidiContext,
int  programIndex,
int  insIndex
) 
 

Map a MIDI program number to an instrument index.

This allows multiple programs to be mapped to a single instrument.

int SPMIDI_SetInstrumentPreset (  SPMIDI_Context *  spmidiContext,
int  insIndex,
void *  inputPreset
)
